selector.description: A CSS selector that targets a single element

value.description: The value to set the target elements value to

loginUrl.description: The URL to the login page on which the login form can be accessed

name.description: The name input field selector relative from the form

password.description: The password input field selector relative from the form

redirectsToMainUrl.description: Defines whether a redirect to the main URL is expected after a successful login

reloadTimeout.description: The time to wait for a page reload before assuming that the login failed in milliseconds

url.description: The url to display in the page

name.description: A custom name for the page which will show up in the web interface

displayTime.description: The time for which the page will be displayed in seconds

reloadTime.description: The interval in which the time will be reloaded in seconds

reloadAfterAppInit.description: Defines whether this page will be reloaded after all initial page loads are complete

zoomFactor.description: Defines the factor in percent/100 by which the page will be zoomed

cssFiles.description: A list of custom css files to inject into the page relative from the config directory

jsFiles.description: A list of custom javascript files to inject into the page relative from the config directory

autoLogin.description: The configuration for an automatic login for this page

x.description: The x coordinate of the top left corner of the window on the screen(s)

y.description: The y coordinate of the top left corner of the window on the screen(s)

position.description: The position of the window on the screen(s)

fullscreen.description: Defines whether the window should take up an entire screen (screen selection is based on the position)

pageDefaults.description: The default page settings which will be copied into every page

items.title: page
items.description: The page specific settings (these may overwrite the default page settings)

windowDefaults.description: The default window settings which will be copied into every window
